name: Spriggan
description:
Spriggan is a short puzzle game where you play as a spirit navigating her way through a new world. Solve the puzzles to activate the gate and find your way back.

Key features:

  • Colour matching puzzles
  • A floaty wall jump (Nice!)
  • Some sparkling animations
  • Bouncy mushrooms!

Spriggan is a short and simple puzzle game that anyone can play :)

Have fun!
